data_table.description: Cerebral Microbleeds (CMB) by 1st MRI, Done Within 2 Years of Neuropsychological Battery, Original Cohort, 12/2000 to 10/2004.

variable.name: idtype
variable.comment: IDTYPE and ID taken together form a unique study participant ID number.

variable.name: mri_excludeON
variable.description: Prevalent other neurologic disorders at MRI Y/N
variable.value: No prevalent other neurologic disorders at MRI
Yes prevalent other neurologic disorders at MRI

variable.name: any_cmb
variable.value: Participant has one or more CMBs

variable.name: any_deep
variable.description: One or more deep CMBs Y/N
variable.comment: A CMB is defined as deep if it is located in any of the following regions: basal ganglia, brainstem, caudate, thalamus or cerebellum.
variable.value: Participant has one or more deep CMBs

variable.name: any_lobar
variable.description: One or more lobar CMB Y/N
variable.comment: A CMB is defined as lobar if it is located in any of the following regions: frontal cortex, frontal white matter, occipital cortex, occipital white matter, parietal cortex, parietal white matter, temporal cortex or temporal white matter.
variable.value: Participant has one or more lobar CMBs

variable.name: ndeep
variable.description: Number of deep CMBs per participant
variable.value: No deep CMBs, but has lobar CMBs

variable.name: nlobar
variable.description: Number of lobar CMBs per participant
variable.value: No lobar CMBs but has deep CMBs

variable.name: cmb_tot
variable.description: Total number of CMBs per participant
